title: Best way to book cheap flight tickets
text:
As of rising inflation and the ongoing economic crises, it has made to curb our travel expenses to cut down by booking cheap flight tickets or search for discount on hotel bookings. 
As of rising inflation and the ongoing economic crises, it has made to curb our travel expenses to cut down by booking cheap flight tickets or search for discount on hotel bookings. Although most of the airlines are increasing the airfares in these recent years, a research and booking your flight ticket in advance will help you in purchasing cheap flight tickets for the destination you are traveling. In this article we will explain how to purchase cheap flight tickets. 

Suggestions on purchasing cheap flight tickets 

Purchasing a cheap flight ticket plays a very important in making your holiday a pleasant one and cost efficient. Here are few suggestion by which you can avail cheap flight tickets. 

Planning in your journey in advance 
One of the best way to avail cheap flight tickets is by planning your holiday or business trip in advance. If you plan your holiday or trip in advance you will have some time to search for discounts and offers which are offered by airlines and online travel portals. You can sign up for newsletter from online travel portal with which you can avail the details of various discounts and deals which are being offered by airlines and online travel portals. 

Use of online travel portals regularly 
With the help of this you will be informed about the discounts and offers which are offered by travel portal itself. Many online travel sites offers cheap flight tickets to its customers who book through them regularly. You should never miss this opportunity. 

Keep a track of air fares. 
You should keep a track of the air fares for the sector which you are traveling for on a regular basis. By keep the track of the air fares will keep you informed about the air fare drop or about the special offers. You can also fill in your travel dates and details on your preferred online travel portal and ask them to inform you about the airfare drop and special discounts.

Comparison of air fares. 
Never book your flight tickets at the first available rates. Try to do some research on flight tickets by checking through multiple airline and travel sites. And if you are not able to book the flight tickets at the price which you are looking for, then wait for the airfares to drop and book your tickets. 

Be flexible with your date of journey 
Cheap flight tickets can be availed by making your travel dates flexible, that is by just modifying your dates according to the availability of the tickets. 

Use of airlines miles points 
Most of the airlines offer flier miles points to the passengers who travel regularly through their airlines. You can collect those points and use them to avail discounts on your future flight tickets. 

The best way to avail cheap flight tickets is by booking the tickets through your regular online travel website.
